1.content: before we start, what gender are you?

111.content: Are you human or an anthro
111.title: a high school

112.content: Are you a human, monster or anthro?
112.title: miss grimwood's school for ghouls

1123.content: You are Hypon, a night-blood hedgewolf with Vampire DNA. He's normally nice but shy around some girls. He was shocked that they sent him there, but he didnt care. He want to be with other creatures, no matter what gender. Hypon knocks on the door and who answers?
1123.title: Anthro

11232.content:
It was sibella.
"hello." she said.
Then
11232.title: A vampire

112322.content: Winne enters. Winne: Hello, Welcome to Grimwoods. Hypon: (shyly) Thanks. I'm Hypon.
112322.title: Winnie appeared. (werewolf)

11232212.content: Phantasma: Hello. Welcome to Grimwood. Hypon: (in mind) How many girls go to this school, well, at least they're bueaty in there way.
11232212.title: phantasma appeared

112322121.content:
Phantasma: this is tailsana
Tailsana: hi
112322121.title: Tailsana appeared

1123221211.content: Hypon: Pleasure. (Matches enters) Matches: (growls at Hypon) Tannis: Matches, calm down. This is our new student. Hypon: Matches, I barely see many pet dragons. Tannis: Matches is nice but he needs time to trust. Hypon: That's probobly true for everyone.
1123221211.title: Continue

11232212111.content:
Miss Grimwood: Welcome Hypon.
Hypon: It is my pleasure
11232212111.title: Miss Grimwood enters

112322121111.content: Grimwood: I should congraulate you for being the first male student but I see this is all new to you. Hypon: Yes, it is, Miss Grimwood, but I should honored to be with the daughters of so many legends.
112322121111.title: Continue

1123221211111.content: Miss Grimwood: Well, we should get you settled
1123221211111.title: Continue

11232212111111.content: Hypon: Agreed. (hears something) Excuse Me for a second (disappers) Outside with the Calloway Boys. Mist: This is Mist, I think has Grimwood has a new student, but he's a Boy. Hurricane: Impossible, it's a girl school. Mist: I just saw him, Hurricane. Hypon: And I'm right next to you, Mist. Mist turns around and runs towards Calloway.
11232212111111.title: Continue

112322121111111.content:
Tailsana: hello boys
Mist: tailsana.
Peter pan: hello chaps
112322121111111.title: Continue

1123221211111111.content: Hypon: I suggest you mates start stepping before we get cracking. (crackes his knuckles) Mist: Ok. (runs away and signals fall back)
1123221211111111.title: Continue

112322121111111111.content: Hypon: I'll agree to that Peter, come on let's go back in (telports back to Mrs. Grimwood) Sorry about that, Calloway kids were spying around.
112322121111111111.title: Continue

1123221211111111111.content:
Peter pan: (flies back)
Tailsana: (flies back with Peter)
1123221211111111111.title: Continue

11232212111111111111.content: Hypon whent up the stairs and entered his room who was next to Sibella and Tailsana's bedroom.
11232212111111111111.title: Continue

112322121111111111111.content:
Peter: (flies with Tailsana)
Tailsana: (sees the calloway boys) hmm
Peter: what?
Tailsana: (whispers in his ear)
112322121111111111111.title: Continue

1123221211111111111111.content:
Peter: they spy on you so we are going to spy on them?
Tailsana: yeah
1123221211111111111111.title: Continue

121.content: are you a human or an anthro?

1211.content:
Which girl?

Miley Martin: human long brown hair with blue eyes.
Pale skin
Nicknames: mile miles.
Very smart. Loves science and history and geography.
Loves to sing.
Height: 5ft 8
In year 9

Tikalina: human with very long black hair.
Eye colour is dark brown.
Tanned skin.
Nicknames: lina, Tikal, tikali
Very smart. Comes from a tribe.
Height: 5ft 6
In year 8

Luna star: human with black hair with silver streaks.
Eye colour is emerald.
Pale skin.
Nicknames: luna li
Loves science and history.
Height: 5ft 4
In year 8
1211.title: human

122.content: are you a human, monster, or an anthro?
122.title: miss grimswood school for ghouls

1221.content:
Which human girl?


Maisie Newell: human with long blond hair with purple streaks.
eyes colour is brown. pale skin.
nicknames: mazzy, maz, mozzy, mais, mazatrom (called mazatrom by her dad.) mazola and
mazzo.
very fast (for a human) can control fire. (she found this out in a science lesson)
can control water. (she found this at home when she was INCREDIBLY bored)
has a very good jumping abilty.
LOVES to dance. one thing that is different, she is not normal.
height: 5ft 1
very strong, she may not look it, but she is!
older than tannis and winnie. younger than sibella and elsa. same age as
phantasma.


Roxanne (roxy) Reynolds: human with brown curly hair.
eye colour is blue. pale skin.
strong and fast (for a human) can control ice. (she found this out when she froze a lampost)
best friends with maisie newell. maisie calls her roxy.
also LOVES to dance. she is not normal.
height: 5ft 5 (5 inches taller than maisie)
very smart.
older than tannis. younger than sibella, phantasma and elsa.
same age as winnie.


Choose which girl
1221.title: Human

122231.content:
choose which dragon girl



Dragonia: Daughter of the night fury (dragon)
black with bright yellow eyes.
can only breathe a little fire.
short and blue. has sharp fangs and claws.
can fly very fast and can dive very quickly for fish. she can walk on hind legs.
but normally walks on all fours.
can shapeshift into a human when living among humans.
human name is miley.
when human she has long brown hair and emerald eyes.
and pale skin.
older than tannis and winnie, younger than elsa and sibella. about the same age
as phantasma.


Stormiana: Daughter of the mood dragon.
changes colour depending on mood. eye colour blue
the usaul claws and fangs. can fly fast and dive down for fish.
she can walk on hind legs. but normally walks on fours and flys alot.
can shapeshift into a human and animals when living among humans.
human name is sammy
when human she has long blond hair and brown eyes
and pale skin.
older than tannis and winnie, younger than elsa and sibella.
same age-ish as phantasma.

which one are you going to choose?

pick one!! :)
122231.title: dragon

1222311.content:
"all right, this the place" you say looking around at the surroundings that are around you.

A spooky place and a spooky house. stormy weather and old trees in the garden.
you weren't surprised at the weather, because you were used to bad weather at home.

you rub your purple skirt a few times. and your top a few times aswell.

"one last look to see if i'm good. i want to make a good first impression."

you look down at your blue trainers with white streaks and your bare legs show your
black skin colour, also your black scaley skin. you look at your hands.
they looked perfect. scaley and perfect. just like your thin black and scaley limbs.
you were incredibly strong than average humans and some other dragons.

you take out your mirror and look at your face.

"perfect. just perfect."

you grin in the mirror showing your fangs.

you ring the doorbell and hear a loud howling.

you wait paitently then the door opens revealing a woman in a pink dress with black hair.

"ah welcome. I'm Miss Grimwood, the headmistris you must Dragonia."

"yeah that's correct."

the woman seems pretty nice. this could become alright. then you see two pairs of eyes looking at you.
One is coming from coming from a wolf girl, the other pair of eyes is coming from a girl
who is bandaged from head to toe except from a stroke for her eyes.

"who's that Wnnie?"

"the new girl that Miss Grimwood told us about." said winnie with a grin that showed her
razor sharp teeth.

you grin back showing your sharp dragon fangs.

"hello. I'm Tannis the mummy's daughter, and that's Winnie the werewolf."

"hi... I'm Dragonia... daughter of the night fury dragon." you say.

"Nice to meet you." said Winnie

"shall we show you the other ghouls?" Tannis asks.

"sure." you say following Tannis and Winnie.
1222311.title: Dragonia

choices: phantasma shows you to your room
12223111.content:
"Hello."

The voice makes you jump.

"sorry if i scared you." said the voice again.

It was a vampire girl with violet skin and she was older than you.

you were only twelve and she looked 14 or 13.

"It's alright. My brother always scares me." you say.

"i'm sibella it's fang-tastic to meet you."

she smiled showing her fangs.

"I'm Dragonia, daughter of the night fury dragon."

then a ghost girl appeared making you fall over.

"hee hee, sorry i scared you." said the ghost girl.

"have you seen a ghost before?" sibella asks you.

you nod your head.

"I'm phantasma." said phantasma.

"I'm Dragonia.. daughter of the night fury dragon."

"i see you've already met tannis and winnie." said sibella

you nod your head.

"where's elsa?" asked tannis looking around.

"i'm right here."

the voice was coming from a stitched up girl with black hair with one white strip in her hair.

"i'm elsa."

then a lime green skinned girl with snakes for hair appeared.

"i'm melody.. daughter of medusa." she said.

"I'm Dragonia.. daughter of the night fury dragon." you say again.

"glad that's sorted out." said miss Grimwood.
12223111.title: Meet the other ghouls

122231111.content:
"the bed might be uncomterable." said phantasma.

"it's no problem, I sleep in trees." you say.

"well make yourself comfertable." said phantasma

"ok thanks." you say

You sit on the bed.

It wasn't that bad.

Then
122231111.title: phantasma shows you to your room

1223.title: anthro

12231.content:
"ok, this is the place." you say while you look around.

a creepy house and a creepy place, stormy weather and some old trees in the garden.
sometimes you had bad weather back at home.

you rub your camoflauge pants a few times and you purple top a few times aswell.

"one last check. I want to make a good first impression."

you look down at you purple trainers with white streaks and your bare legs that showed
your pale skin colour. you look at your thin girlie pale limbs. altough they looked weak, you were
incredibly strong.

you take out your mirror and you look at your face

"perfect."

you grin the mirror showing your fangs.

"come on jed. show me your face."

Jedidiah hopped down and smiled. Jedidiah was your cowboy friend and your conscience.

clean and alright.

you ring the doorbell and hear a loud howling.
you wait paitently and you knock on the door.

then the door opens revealing a woman in a pink dress and black hair.

"Welcome. I'm Miss Grimwood, the headmistress of this school. You must be Tailsana."

"Yeah that's correct."

The woman seems pretty nice. this could become alright. Then you see three pairs of eyes looking at you.
One is from a wolf girl. The second pair belong to a sticthed up girl. The last pair of eyes belong to a girl wrapped up in bandages from head to toe except for two small strokes for her eyes.

"Who's that Winnie?"

"The new student Miss Grimwood told us about." Winnie said with a grin that showed her sharp razor teeth.

you grin back showing your dragon like fangs.

"Hello. I'm Tannis, the mummy's daughter, and that's Winnie the werewolf."

"Uh... Hi i'm Tailsana." you say.

"Nice to meet you." said Winnie.

"Yeah it's nice to meet you." said the sticthed up girl.

"that's elsa, daughter of frankestien" said Winnie.

"Shall we show you the other ghouls?" Tannis asks polietly.

"sure." you say following Tannis, elsa and Winnie down the hallway.
12231.title: Tailsana

choices: phantasma shows you to your room
122311.content:
you are led into a bigger room.

"so.. where are they?" you say.

"i'm here.."said a voice

you turn around and you see a vampire girl.

"hi?" you say to her hoping she won't attack you.

"i'm not going to attack you."

"that's sibella." said winnie.

then a sticthed up girl came into the room.

you hear jedidiah go

"oh my god!"

the stitched girl comes right up to your face.

"i'm elsa."

"i'm tailsana."

then a ghost girl came into the room.

"i'm phantasma."

"i'm tailsana."

a girl with snakes for hair came into the room.

"i'm melody.. daughter of medusa." she said.

"i'm tailsana." you say again
122311.title: Meet the other ghouls

info.brief_description: you are a new student in a high school or you go to miss grimwood's ghoul school.
info.description:
you go to a high school
or you go to miss grimwood's school.

play as a monster/ghoul or a human
or those anthro things.

no innapropiate stuff

swearing is allowed

please add and have fun!
